DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate a betterment of the digestive symptomatology by the anti-emetic acupression's bracelets's use associated with hygiene and dietetic advices.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 3 Study of Acupression's Bracelets in Nausea and Vomiting Induced by FEC100 Chemotherapy's Sort.
DOC.criteria: Woman Age > 18 years Wellinformed written consent, signed by the patient before the beginning of the study Breast cancer's diagnosis (operated or not) Forecast of a treatment by FEC100 chemotherapy's sort (D1=D21) during at least 3 cycles. Patient affiliated at a welfare or beneficiary from it Investigator estimates that the patient is able to conform with protocol's conditions and to respect them Operated arm's lymphedema Wrist's morphology which cannot permit the bracelet's wearing (20 cm) D1=D15 FEC100's treatment Psychic incapability to sign a wellinformed consent Refusal to give a written consent Patient under tutelage or guardianship Pregnant or breastfeeding woman Any clinical trial's participation which would impose nausea and vomiting's treatment modalities
